# Session 18 - Assignment

## Part 1 - UNet Implementation from scratch
Need to train it 4 times:

- MP+Tr+BCE
- MP+Tr+Dice Loss
- StrConv+Tr+BCE
- StrConv+Ups+Dice Loss

### s18part1-UNet.ipynb
Notebook for the UNet implementation
